title: enna kavalai inimEl
sahitya:
enna kavalai inimEl manamE


anupallavi

  pannaga shayananai padmanAbha hariyai minnuDaluLLE uyir mannan enrarinda pin


caraNam    karpanaiyAghiya  arpak-kalai kaDandE karudak-karuda sukham perugum tiruvaruLin
oppuyarvillAda shirparAnandanai onrik-kalandu sukham kaNDu kaNDu vanda pin
